value.0:
From Clebrior's Flora:  

"Calotropis, commonly known as milkweed or swallow-wort, is a common wasteland weed. Calotropis belongs to Asclepiadaceae or Milkweed or Ak family which is most abundant in the sub-tropics and tropics, and rare in cold countries. 

Fermented mixture of Calotropis and salt is used to remove the hair from sheep skins to make leather which is much used for inexpensive book-binding. Its powdered roots are used to make a poison that kills all sorts of vermin, ranging from rats to trolls."
